snippet.title: Scorn - Official PlayStation 5 Reveal Trailer
snippet.description: Scorn is an atmospheric first-person horror adventure game developed by Ebb Software. Players enter a nightmarish and grotesque world where learning the rules and manipulating the machinery left behind will not only reveal the truth behind secrets but the key to survival. With its arrival on PlayStation 5, Scorn comes equipped with DualSense capabilities such as haptic feedback, 4K resolution, 60 FPS, and more. Scorn comes to PlayStation 5 in Fall 2023.
